>-    Identifies the association (relationship) between 2 continuous variables within one sample
>-    NOT the same as causation
>-    Determine 3 characteristics:
>       -   Type (linear, non-linear)
>       -   Strength (strong, weak)
>       -   Direction (positive, negative)
